Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; race/face menu
set MQ01.timer to 2
set MQ01.stage to 10

; movement tutorial done
; trigger Valen Dreth talking
setstage charactergen 6

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Use the left stick to move around. The right stick turns you.
To move forward, &sUActnForward;, &sUActnBack; to move back. To move left, &sUActnSldleft;. To move right, &sUActnSldright;. The mouse turns you. To run, &sUActnRun;.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; if they already have a weapon, go to next part of tutorial
setstage mq01 18

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: You need a weapon. Check Captain Renault's body. To open any container, approach it and &sUActnActivate; when its name appears.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; when player loots one of the corpses in the initial ambush, trigger next tutorial
; set timer for next message
set MQ01.timer to 3
set MQ01.stage to 20

; interface tutorial message done
; trigger inventory tutorial
set MQ01.menustage to 22
set MQ01.menuTimer to 0

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: To bring up your journal, &sUActnMenumode;. You can use this to view your character's attributes, equip armor and weapons, and choose spells.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; display inventory tutorial done
; trigger equip tutorial
; REMOVED:
;set MQ01.invstage to 26
;set MQ01.menuTimer to 0
; instead, go directly to:
; trigger weapon/block tutorial
set MQ01.stage to 28
set MQ01.timer to 4

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Pull the Right or Left Trigger to change sections. From the items tab you can equip armor and weapons.
Click on the fist icon at the bottom of the journal to bring up the inventory tab. From here, you can equip armor and weapons by clicking on them.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; secret wall is activated
CGRatA1.setav aggression 20
CGRatA2.setav aggression 20
CGRatA1.startcombat player
CGRatA2.startcombat player
; next tutorial
set MQ01.timer to .5
set MQ01.stage to 28

; NOTE: REMOVED CURRENTLY
; equip tutorial done
; trigger weapon/block tutorial
set MQ01.stage to 28
set MQ01.timer to 4

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Press A to equip the item. Press A again to unequip it. X will drop items.
Click on an item to equip it. Click again to unequip it. Shift-click to drop an item.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; weapon/block tutorial done
; NOTE: removed; put on rat death script instead.
; trigger magic selection tutorial
;set MQ01.timer to 15
;set MQ01.stage to 34

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: To ready your weapon or fists, &sUActnRdyitem;. To attack, &sUActnUse;. To block, &sUActnBlock;.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; how to choose spell message
; trigger spell selection
set MQ01.menustage to 36
set MQ01.menuTimer to 0
;autosave

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Now practice casting spells. To cast your selected spell, &sUActnCast;. If you want to change spells, &sUActnMenumode; to bring up your journal again.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; trigger spell selection tutorial
set MQ01.magicstage to 38
set MQ01.menutimer to 0

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Select the spell icon at the bottom of the journal to bring up the magic tab.
Click on the spell icon at the bottom of the journal to bring up the magic tab.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; spell selection tutorial done
; trigger spellcasting tutorial
set MQ01.stage to 42
set MQ01.timer to .5

; trigger rats to push blocks
CGRatA1.evp
CGRatA2.evp

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Before you can use the bow, you'll need arrows. Check the skeleton to see what it contains.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; how to use bow
; 1. get arrows

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Now that you have arrows, pick up the bow and practice using it.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; how to use bow #2: get bow

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: To use a bow, you'll need to have both the bow and some arrows equipped. Go into your inventory and equip them now.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; use bow tutorial (have both bow and arrows now)

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Now you're ready to practice with your bow. The bucket near the well will make a good target. To draw and aim, &sUActnUse;. Release it when you're ready to fire.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; practice firing arrows at bucket

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Nice shot! You can retrieve arrows from the world, as well as recovering some of the arrows you fire into enemies.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; message on hitting bucket done

; light vs. heavy armor
set MQ01.invstage to 62
; light vs. heavy continued

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: You have found a Mortar and Pestle. Equip it to create potions or poisons from ingredients with like effects. Your Alchemy skill will make your creations more powerful.
You have found a Repair Hammer. Equip it to repair your weapons and armor using your Armorer skill. Damaged weapons and armor are less effective, so it is wise to keep them in good repair.

If you have a lockpick, you can try to pick most locks. Move the pick upward into a tumbler. When the tumbler reaches the top of the lock, press A to secure it in place. When all tumblers are at the top, the lock will open.

If you have a lockpick, you can try to pick most locks. Move the pick upward into a tumbler. When the tumbler reaches the top of the lock, click the left mouse button to secure it in place. When all tumblers are at the top, the lock will open.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; lockpicking

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Your Health is low and you are close to death. Increase it by drinking potions, casting heal spells, or sleeping. The red bar at the bottom left displays your current Health.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; low health

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Your Magicka is low and you may not be able to cast spells. Magicka returns slowly on its own, or you can increase it by drinking potions or sleeping. The blue bar at the bottom left displays your current Magicka.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; low magicka

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Your Fatigue is low and you cannot do as much melee damage. Fatigue returns slowly on its own, especially while walking instead of running. The green bar at the bottom left displays your current Fatigue.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; low fatigue

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: You have picked up more than you can carry. In order to move again, you'll need to drop some items, so &sUActnMenumode; to bring up your journal.
You can hotkey items and spells from your journal  by holding Y and pressing a direction on the D-pad. Pressing the D-pad while exploring will equip that item instantly.
You can hotkey items and spells from your journal by holding down a number key and then clicking the item you want in that slot. Pressing this number while exploring will equip that item instantly.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; hotkey tutorial

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Your current encumbrance exceeds the maximum you can carry (displayed in the lower left of the inventory page). Shift-click to drop items you don't need.
Your current encumbrance exceeds the maximum you can carry (displayed in the lower left of the inventory page). Press X to drop items you don't need.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; how to drop items

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: That goblin up ahead hasn't seen you yet. You may be able to sneak by him. To go into sneak mode, &sUActnCrouch;.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: autosave

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Notice that the crosshair changes to an 'eye' while you are sneaking. If the eye is dim, no one can detect you. If the eye is bright, someone can detect you.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; how to sneak, cont'd

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: You now must choose your class. The major skills of your class will start higher than your other skills. You will increase your level by raising these major skills.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source: ; class menu
addachievement 1

; player has exited the sewers. no more character creation
; set timer on tutorial hint
setinchargen 0
set MQ01.timer to 5
set MQ01.stage to 90

; give player fast travel help message
; NOTE: all subsequent tutorials turned off
;set MQ01.timer to 2
;set MQ01.stage to 92
; tutorial all done
setstage mq01 100

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: The red arrow on your compass shows the direction of Weynon Priory. You can walk there by following your compass, or use your world map to travel there directly. Or you can set off in any direction and begin exploring the world on your own. Good luck!

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; quest log and world map tutorial
;set MQ01.menutimer to 1
;set MQ01.menustage to 94

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: To view your quest log, &sUActnMenumode; to bring up your journal.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; trigger quest log tutorial
; NOTE: took this out for now
;set MQ01.menutimer to 1
;set MQ01.mapstage to 96

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: Select the compass at the bottom of the journal to bring up the quest and map tab.
Click on the compass at the bottom of the journal to bring up the quest and map tab.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
; tutorial all done
setstage mq01 100

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: This page displays all your active quests. Select an active quest and press X to display the world map showing your current quest target (if any). You can select any icon on the map to travel directly to that location.

This page displays all your active quests. Click on an active quest and hit the MAP button to display the world map showing your current quest target (if any). You can click on any icon on the map to travel directly to that location.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
stopquest MQ01
stopquest charactergen
set Tutorials.fQuestDelayTime to .1

Log Entries.CNAM - Log Entry: In each attempt to persuade, you must Admire, Boast, Joke, and Coerce. Each of these actions raises or lowers the NPC's disposition. Don't take too long, because the NPC's disposition is steadily falling.

As you highlight each possible action, the NPC's face shows his reaction to it. He will Love, Like, Dislike or Hate each action. His disposition goes up if you select a Loved or Liked action and goes down if you select a Disliked or Hated action.

The potential gain or loss for each action is based on your Speechcraft and how full the wedge is. Try to select fuller wedges when they are aligned with actions the NPC likes. Try to select less full wedges when they are aligned with actions he doesn't like.
All of your possessions have been confiscated by the guards. You will get them back when you have served your sentence. Activate the bed to begin serving your sentence.

Combine ingredients with like effects to create potions and poisons. Your Alchemy skill will make your creations more powerful. The more potions you create, the higher your alchemy skill will go. Use additional apparatuses to improve the strength of the potions you create.
